name: Sprint01_Complete(1)
description: The Sprint 1 project is mainly based on a painting tool by creating 3D objects(Sphere, Cube, and Cylinder) where the user can select colors(Red, Green, and Blue) and change shapes and size of the objects. Also, there are two other features called Destroy All and Timed Object. The Destroy All is basically an option to clear out the screen and Timed Object is an option which destroys the objects in three seconds.
